reg_info.act_under: Ontario Municipal Support Grants Act   Loi sur les subventions de soutien aux municipalités de l’Ontario

content.content: 1. The Eastern Ontario Disaster Relief Committee is a municipality for the purposes of section 2 of the Ontario Municipal Support Grants Act. O. Reg. 205/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Eastern Ontario Disaster Relief Committee is a municipality for the purposes of section 2 of the Ontario Municipal Support Grants Act. O. Reg. 205/98, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The Sault Ste. Marie North Planning Board is deemed to be a municipality for the purposes of section 2 of the Act. O. Reg. 70/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 2. The Sault Ste. Marie North Planning Board is deemed to be a municipality for the purposes of section 2 of the Act. O. Reg. 70/01, s. 1.
